column2: Check and modify spells your actors have equipped.
Select which actors will enter battle.
Check help\c bestiary\c and play records.
Erase memories and end Project Re:Kuroi.
Battle against defeated bosses and special monsters.
Attack when party is not at full HP.
Ally is afflicted with Poison\c Darkness or Stun.
Win a battle while in Critical Condition.
Hit to Critical Condition after getting ????.
Reduce damage by Guard Effect (GRD) amount.
Cannot act/take more damage. Broken when attacked.
Cannot act. Broken when attacked/turns pass.
Cannot act. Broken when user attacked/turns pass.
Take all target’s single\c but not party\c attacks.
Take no damage from enemy attacks.
Nullifies damage under a certain amount.
Take all ally’s single\c but not party\c attacks.
Increase SPD after actions\c to max of 10.
Reflect half of enemy attack damage.
Set screen mode and toggle special effects.
Set volume of BGM\c ambient sounds\c sound effects\c and voices.
Set voice volume for specific characters.
Adjust system settings such as screen mode.
Send message to support or read the credits.
Use this to gauge message speed.
Toggle normal battle skip. If skip is on\c bosses will have 1 HP.
“Wait” will pause the game after a turn is taken.
Adjust how keys are displayed. Press okay to assign keys.
Send a tweet to the dev.
Toggle between full screen and windowed mode.
Import uploaded save data from sync code.
Toggle event buttons (backlog\c skip\c etc) on or off during events.
Toggle weather and special effects. Turn off if having slowdowns.
Toggle registration for battle score leaderboard.
Toggle tutorial messages on or off.
Screen image speed. 30 FPS can sometimes improve game performance.
Press a key to bind it.
Please have the sync code below handy for data sync and support calls.
Please input the sync code shown below.
Please check data sync code for errors.
This event has no battle stage!
Cannot use Challenge while in a battle stage.
This will reset current stage progress.
Please input six characters or more.
Press a button to resume combat.
All actors temporarily added to party.
When you finish the Challenge\c party will return to normal.
Put all enemies in Critical Condition
This is a free demo for \C[6]Re:Kuroi\C[0].
You can play \C[6]up to Act 5\C[0] in it.
If you find any bugs\c or have thoughts to share\c please let us know.
You can contact the dev by going to the \C[6]Options\C[0]
menu and selecting \C[6]Tweet the Dev\C[0] or \C[6]Support.\C[0]
\C[15]If you find any bugs\c or have thoughts to share\c please let us know.
